bug.description:
I am trying this script to show a map using ScatterplotLayer , by default it works fine, now when I try to customize the radius of the dots, I use this function 'getRadius' here is a reproducible example <denchmark-code>import streamlit as st import pandas as pd st.title('first report') @st.cache(persist=True) def fetch_and_clean_data(): df = pd.read_json('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/djouallah/keplergl/master/data.json') df.columns=['lon','lat','date','status'] return df df = fetch_and_clean_data() status = df['status'].unique() option = st.selectbox('Select Status',status) df = df[df['status'] == option] #st.write(df) st.deck_gl_chart( viewport={ 'latitude': min(df['lat']), 'longitude': min(df['lon']), 'zoom': 11, 'pitch': 50, }, layers=[{ 'type': 'ScatterplotLayer', 'data': df, 'getRadius':3, 'getFillColor':[255,25,0] }]) </denchmark-code>
sometimes, it show empty map, when i manually change the value of 'getRadius' in the python file to something else then it works.

comments.comment: I believe this was an issue with MapBox that has been fixed. In any case, cannot reproduce.
